ygData.messageBody:
B

A

H


H

U

M

B

U

G

(to spoiler spaces)

Hmmm, I thought (heard rumor) that you had to attack an underwater goblin
and pull him out of the water (and then zone because he was a deep red) -
and that would trigger Webclaw to spawn outside of the water at the base of
the Fire Tower.

Sylly Songsynger
Bard of the 29th song
<Spirit of the Moon>
somewhere on Innoruuk


-----Original Message-----
From: Talies the Wanderer [mailto:snicker@...]
Sent: Wednesday, September 29, 1999 4:50 PM

Subject: [eqbards] Correction to Blued 2handed hammer
[Spoiler]

From: Talies the Wanderer <snicker@...>

Not correct - he is an aqua goblin who regularly comes out
of the water. I
was hunting aviaks when a nearby farmer kept killing him
every 30 minutes
or so (immediately followed by "For Sale: Water Crystal
Staff, 30pp")
